summary: The Flying Dutchman is a famous ghost ship from Dutch legends. It's said to be cursed, forever sailing the seas without ever reaching land. The story started during the powerful Dutch maritime era in the 1600s. People believe it was a cargo ship called a fluyt. Over time, sightings of the ship were reported, glowing with a strange light. Seeing it was thought to be a bad omen. Even though it's just a legend, it's still a popular tale about a haunted ship.
title: Flying Dutchman
